actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Agriculture and Forestry, S. Rept. 94-970.
Placed on calendar in Senate under Subjects on the Table.

official_title: A resolution reported relating to sanitation facilities for agricultural workers.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Occupational Safety and Health Administration should not issue final regulations respecting sanitation facilities for agricultural employees in the field until representatives of that agency have testified before the Subcommittee on Rural Development of the Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

titles.title: A resolution reported relating to sanitation facilities for agricultural workers.
